item.title: Add blob generator and CSS gradient maker
item.description:
https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/blob-generator - — Create random organic-shaped blobs with solid colors, linear/radial gradients, and pattern fills.
https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/gradient-generator - Generator](https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/gradient-generator) — Create, save & share beautiful CSS linear, radial, and conic gradients for your backgrounds.

item.title: add netdata

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://hyperforms.app/ - Create form to email and more in seconds and without backend code. The Personal account gives you up to 50 form submissions per month for free.

item.title: Add ZenRows
item.description: https://www.zenrows.com/ - Web Scraping API & proxy server that bypasses any anti-bot solution while offering javascript rendering, rotating proxies, and geotargeting. Free tier of 1000 API calls.
